prompts.name: Normalize Profile
prompts.content:
Given the following profile content, extract and normalize the information into a structured format:

{content}

Please extract the following fields:
- Name
- Title
- Company
- Location
- Skills
- Experience
- Education

Provide the output in JSON format.

prompts.name: Extract Metadata
prompts.content:
Given the following document content, extract relevant metadata:

{content}

Please extract:
- Document type
- Creation date
- Last modified date
- Author(s)
- Keywords/tags

Provide the output in JSON format.
